testcase.classname: Global Footer links test on World Wide India site
testcase.name: Verify India website global footer links
testcase.system-out: Given I have navigated to "India" site......................................passed And I scroll to the footer section at the bottom............................passed When I click on the footer "Banking & Financial Services" link..............passed Then the loaded page URL is "https://www.cognizant.com/banking-financial-technology-solutions".passed
